sentence.Network_en: Had he been indiscreet in what he had said?
sentence.Network_cn: 他曾轻率地说过什么吗？

sentence.Network_en: Tom was utterly indiscreet, and could never keep a secret.
sentence.Network_cn: 汤姆言语很不谨慎，什么时候也别想他守住秘密。

sentence.Network_en: How could he be so indiscreet?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英格丽褒曼 ... 1958 The Inn of the Sixth Happiness 六福客栈 1958 Indiscreet 钓金龟 1964 The Yellow Rolls-Royce 黄色香车.
英语词缀 ... distaste（ 反感） indiscreet（ 轻率的）, ineffectual（ 徒劳的）.
难以发现的的英文翻译 ... indiscretionary 卤莽的, 轻率的 indiscreet 不慎重的, 轻率的 indiscreetly 轻率地.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... discreet 言行谨慎的，小心的 indiscreet 不谨慎的，无礼的 gadget 小工具，小机械.

list.abs: an indiscreet remark triggered off a long and costly strike .一次轻率的讲话导致长时间、代价高昂的罢工。
indiscreet fool is a nation ' s best diplomat ., 轻率之傻子乃国家最好之外交家.
The girl ' s indiscreet behavior was a distress to her parents ., 那女孩行为不检 , 使她父母十分痛苦.
more trouble is caused in this world by indiscreet answers than by indiscreet questions轻率的回答在这个世界上造成的麻烦比轻率的问题造成的麻烦多得多

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (originally as indiscrete in the sense 'lacking discernment or judgement'): from late Latin indiscretus 'not separate or distinguishable' (in medieval Latin 'careless, indiscreet'), from in- 'not' + discretus 'separate' (see discreet). Compare with indiscrete

entry.def: If you describe someone as indiscreet, you mean that they do or say things in public which they should only do or say secretly or in private.

example.ex: He is notoriously indiscreet about his private life...
example.tran: 他在私生活方面的不检点是出了名的。

example.ex: Had he been indiscreet in what he had said?
example.tran: 他曾轻率地说过什么吗？

sentences.sentence: "her behavor was indiscreet at the very best"

auth_sentence.content: But what of an indiscreet picture posted on a whim?
auth_sentence.res_content: But what of an indiscreet picture posted on a whim?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But what of an indiscreet picture posted on a whim?

auth_sentence.content: Once considered indiscreet to mention, it's now the beginning and end of any discussion of the election.
auth_sentence.res_content: Once considered indiscreet to mention, it's now the beginning and end of any discussion of the election.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Once considered indiscreet to mention, it's now the beginning and end of any discussion of the election.

sentences.en: An indiscreet remark triggered off a long and costly strike.
sentences.cn: 一次轻率的讲话导致长时间、代价高昂的罢工。

sentences.en: We’ve been too indiscreet,to say the least.
sentences.cn: 至少可以说,我们一贯太轻率。
